data.name: Happy Doodle
data.descript: The doodle game could playback the doodle process as a cartoon.
data.descript-zh: 可以播放動畫的塗鴉遊戲

data.name: Paperone﹣Drawing board
data.descript: Paper One is a painting application which is imitating the real paintbrush，you can drawing in your phone or tablet at anytime!
data.descript-zh: PaperOne是一款模擬真實畫筆的繪畫應用，瞬間把手機和平板變成你的手繪本，實現隨想隨畫！

data.name: Phototext
data.descript: Phototext is an image-text production application which is concise and fantastic !
data.descript-zh: Phototext是一款簡潔流暢的圖文製作應用

data.name: Animals Coloring Game
data.descript: A realistic coloring experience just like working with actual pencils and paper!
data.descript-zh: 遊戲模擬真實的畫筆塗色，讓你享受最開心的塗色體驗！
